School Policies

Attendance Policy

  • Minimum 75% attendance is required for annual promotion
  • Students must inform the school in case of absence
  • Leave applications must be submitted for planned absences
  • Medical certificates required for absence exceeding 3 days

Uniform Policy

  • Students must wear proper school uniform daily
  • PE uniform to be worn on designated sports days
  • Hair should be neatly groomed; long hair must be tied
  • ID cards must be worn at all times on campus

Discipline Code

  • Students must maintain discipline inside and outside the classroom
  • Respectful behavior towards teachers, staff, and fellow students
  • Mobile phones are strictly prohibited during school hours
  • Vandalism or damage to school property will result in strict action
  • Bullying, violence, or inappropriate behavior is strictly prohibited

Examination Policy

  • Regular tests and examinations as per academic calendar
  • Minimum passing marks as per board guidelines
  • Re-examination facility for genuine cases (medical reasons)
  • Results will be communicated to parents through report cards
  • Malpractice in examinations will lead to strict disciplinary action

Fee Payment Policy

  • Fees must be paid quarterly/annually as per schedule
  • Late payment will attract a penalty
  • Fee receipts must be preserved for records
  • No fee refund after admission confirmation
  • Scholarship available for meritorious and economically weaker students

Parental Involvement

  • Parents are encouraged to attend PTMs (Parent-Teacher Meetings)
  • Regular communication between parents and teachers
  • Parents should monitor student's academic progress
  • Active participation in school events and activities

Safety & Security

  • Identity verification for visitors entering campus
  • Students can only be picked up by authorized persons
  • Emergency contact numbers must be updated
  • Regular fire and safety drills conducted
  • CCTV surveillance for campus security

Code of Conduct

All members of the school community are expected to:

  • Treat everyone with dignity and respect
  • Uphold the values and reputation of the school
  • Follow all rules and regulations
  • Maintain honesty and integrity in all activities
  • Be responsible citizens and contribute positively to society

"Helping Students Grow Into Leaders of Today and Tomorrow"
